description: Kburgers serves breakfast & Lunch.  All of our breakfast sandwiches are served on authentic New York Bagels or Ciabatta.Bagel choices are: Plain; Poppy; French Toast; Everything; Pumpernickel; Asiago Cheese or Multi-grainAll of our premium KBurgers are 100% ground beef, cooked slow, simmered and served on a hoagie bun.What makes the KBurgers special are the ingredients used to cook them - a secret family recipe!
name: Kburgers
